thread.title: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame
thread.title_full: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame

title: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame
text:
Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame Updated 12:08 pm, Wednesday, October 14, 2015 Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 2 Close Image 1 of 2 
FILE - In this Aug. 25, 2014 file photo, Jimmy Fallon presents an award at the 66th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards in Los Angeles. Fallon and guitarist Keith Richards will be special guests helping to induct their friends into the Memphis Music Hall of Fame. Richards will induct Elvis Presley’s guitarist Scotty Moore and Fallon will induct pop star Justin Timberlake during the ceremony on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File) Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP FILE - In this Aug. 25, 2014 file photo, Jimmy Fallon presents an... Image 2 of 2 
FILE - In this July 15, 2015 file photo, Keith Richards of the Rolling Stones seen at the Le Festival d'ete de Quebec in Quebec City, Canada. Richards and late night talk show host Jimmy Fallon will be special guests helping to induct their friends into the Memphis Music Hall of Fame. Richards will induct Elvis Presley’s guitarist Scotty Moore and Fallon will induct pop star Justin Timberlake during the ceremony on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (Photo by Barry Brecheisen/Invision/AP, File) Photo: Barry Brecheisen, Barry Brecheisen/Invision/AP FILE - In this July 15, 2015 file photo, Keith Richards of the... Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame 1 / 2 Back to Gallery MEMPHIS, Tenn. (AP) — Rolling Stones ' guitarist Keith Richards and "Tonight Show" host Jimmy Fallon will be special guests helping to induct their friends into the Memphis Music Hall of Fame. Richards will induct Elvis Presley 's guitarist Scotty Moore and Fallon will induct pop star Justin Timberlake during the ceremony on Saturday. Performers include Steve Cropper, Tracy Nelson , Melanie Fiona and Charlie Rich Jr. ___
